EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for sending your quote request. We follow up on your original request for quote. Our systems experienced some disruptions and we are unable to determine if we have already replied with a quote for the referenced item(s). While this may be older, we wanted to take the opportunity to ensure you received the information should this still be a requirement.
A formal quote has been forwarded directly under separate copy to your attention from our quoting system. Honeywell offers this quote per Honeywell commercial terms and conditions as outlined at the http://Myaerospace.com (sign in>products>Select Catalog>Terms and Conditions). The quote is only valid for 30 business days, beginning from the date of this correspondence. Items quoted are limited to the quantity, price, and delivery quoted and are subject to prior sale.
If you would like to order the referenced item(s), please refer to the quotation provided, and send your purchase request directly to orders@honeywell.com.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
